quotes.quote: Great ability develops and reveals itself increasingly with every new assignment.
quotes.author: Baltasar Gracian

quotes.quote: Put yourself on view. This brings your talents to light.
quotes.author: Baltasar Gracian

quotes.quote: Hide not your talents, they for use were made. What's a sun-dial in the shade?
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: If you have a talent, use it in every which way possible. Don't hoard it. Don't dole it out like a miser. Spend it lavishly like a millionaire intent on going broke.
quotes.author: Brendan Francis

quotes.quote: Natural ability without education has more often attained to glory and virtue than education without natural ability.
quotes.author: Cicero

quotes.quote: Everyone has talent. What is rare is the courage to follow the talent to the dark place where it leads.
quotes.author: Erica Jong

quotes.quote: Work while you have the light. You are responsible for the talent that has been entrusted to you.
quotes.author: Henri-Fr�d�ric Amiel

quotes.quote: Use what talents you possess: the woods would be very silent if no birds sang there except those that sang best.
quotes.author: Henry Van Dyke

quotes.quote: It doesn't pay to be good at something unless you are the absolute best at it.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: We are always more anxious to be distinguished for a talent which we do not possess, than to be praised for the fifteen which we do possess.
quotes.author: Rosalynn Carter

quotes.quote: You have to have confidence in your ability, and then be tough enough to follow through.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: Toil to make yourself remarkable by some talent or other.
quotes.author: Sir Arthur Conan Doyle

quotes.quote: Mediocrity knows nothing higher than itself, but talent instantly recognizes genius.
quotes.author: Sophia Loren

quotes.quote: Getting ahead in a difficult profession requires avid faith in yourself. That is why some people with mediocre talent, but with great inner drive, go much further than people with vastly superior talent.
quotes.author: Sydney Smith

quotes.quote: Whatever you are by nature, keep to it; never desert your line of talent. Be what nature intended you for and you will succeed.
